text:
Nervousness, huh...
But, I guess it's unavoidable.

In the beginning, I think everyone experiences it,
regardless of who they are.
...Was it the same for you, Producer?

Yeah. Even though my work and position are
different from everyone else's, I went through it too.

I see...
...I wonder if Luca-chan also had those moments?

Yeah, hmm... ...No, it wouldn't be right
for me to assume and answer on her behalf.

...Huh?
Is it okay to ask her something like that?

Yeah, since you're in the same unit now,
it might be a good conversation starter.

...Hehe, okay.
Then I'll ask Luca-chan about it next time.
